Shiny includes 11 examples. Run with `runExample(num_name)`.

* `01_hello`
* `02_text`
* `03_reactivity`
* `04_mpg`
* `05_sliders`
* `06_tabsets`
* `07_widgets`
* `08_html`
* `09_upload`
* `10_download`
* `11_timer`
